senses.sense_definition: The practice of using <w>Esperanto</w> or participating in the movement and ideals associated with it.

examples.text: His dedication to <w>esperantism</w> inspired him to organize international gatherings.
The article discusses the rise of <w>esperantism</w> in the early twentieth century.

senses.sense_definition: A linguistic feature, idiom, or characteristic peculiar to the <w>Esperanto</w> language.

examples.text: The translator tried to avoid any awkward <w>Esperantisms</w> in the final text.
Using suffixes to create new words is a typical <w>esperantism</w> found in the language.
